name: @alextheman/components
description: A package containing common React components used across my projects
author: alextheman

scripts.change-major:
pnpm version major -m "Change version number to v%s

The changes associated with this version may remove certain features and/or change existing features in such a way that would require users to heavily refactor their code. Please see the associated commits with this pull request for more information on what changed."
scripts.change-minor: pnpm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: pnpm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.create-local-package: pnpm run build && rm -f alextheman-components-*.tgz && pnpm pack
scripts.format: pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: pnpm run format-prettier-typescript && pnpm run format-prettier-javascript
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tsc && pnpm run lint-eslint && pnpm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: pnpm run lint-prettier-typescript && pnpm run lint-prettier-javascript
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: npm --prefix ../eslint-plugin run create-local-package && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && pnpm install --save-dev ../eslint-plugin/alextheman-eslint-plugin-*.tgz
